EOSLuaThisRestorer Class Reference

This class is used to load the correct "this" reference each time the execution enters on a new script (based on code from Richard Shephard, published on CodeProject website: http://www.codeproject.com/cpp/luaincpp.asp). More...

#include <EOSLuaThisRestorer.h>

Protected Attributes

int oldThisRef
EOSLuaEnvironment * luaEnv

Detailed Description

This class is used to load the correct "this" reference each time the execution enters on a new script (based on code from Richard Shephard, published on CodeProject website: http://www.codeproject.com/cpp/luaincpp.asp).
